summary: The evil Cobra Khan rises from the underworld and begins polluting the environment. The White Dragon tries to stop him but is injured so must pass the job onto his three teenage students.
cast: Robert Z'Dar|Richard Rabago|Gary Daniels|Sondi|Bradley Joseph|Joseph Valencia|Mel Novak|Rick Rabago|Lelagi Togisala|Suzanne Hennigar|Donna Simoneau|Ron Hall|William Christopher Ford|Hedi Catlin|Charlotte Leslie|Scott Faris|Luther Yee|Senosa Togisala|Tony Valiente|Kim Carter|William G. Villegas|Diane Carroll|Keri Sutman|Nadia Nassar|Kerisha Revis|Holly Handley|David Loo|Juliet Eriksson|Kent Ducanon|David Dick|Joe Hanlin|Joe Sloan|Alejandria Vargas|Greg Saterfield|Michael Mills|Romeo Herrera|Scott Shaw|Tadashi Yamashita
title: Pocket Ninjas
